timeline.bodyText: Java packages should be at the top level
timeline.author: a364176773

timeline.bodyText: you don't have to do that
timeline.author: a364176773

timeline.bodyText: I think the pipe can be used instead
timeline.author: a364176773

replies.bodyText:
I think the pipe can be used instead

这个地方没有使用pipeline,主要考虑，如果多个tc都来操作，都判断全局事务是存在的，然后都去修改，那会不会出问题。而这几个命令，尤其是hmset，map存不存在，它都会成功。pipeline，看起来防不住这种并发修改的场景。
replies.author: lightClouds917

replies.bodyText: I think a direct lock + pipeline is better than Multi
replies.author: a364176773
